# Dates

::: callout
## Learning Objectives
+ Work with date and time variables using `lubridate`
+ Convert a string variable into a date / time variable 
+ Extract date / time information from a date / time variable (e.g. month, year, day of the week, etc) 
+ Convert between UTC and other time zones (?)
:::
